articles.description: Pete Davidson and Phoebe Dynevor enjoy PDA-filled Wimbledon date
articles.content: Pete Davidson has been pictured during a PDA-filled date with his new A-list flame.The 27-year-old Saturday Night Live star and Bridgerton actress Phoebe Dynevor made their first public appearance as… [+1450 chars]
